{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-12T18:02:48.000Z", "description": "

DURATION: 6 months W2 contract


Job Overview:


This person will be working with Site Reliability Engineering group. This role may require weekend work based on business needs (deployment, maintenance support, or critical issues).


Responsibilities:

\u2022 Troubleshoots highly complex, intricate technical problems to ensure optimal service levels; works on multiple incidents and/or projects simultaneously

\u2022 Is viewed as an invaluable resource in the technical and operational aspects of one or more IT disciplines

\u2022I s consulted as a subject-matter expert in areas of technology and technical operations

\u2022 Acts as a point of escalation in complex, critical instances and leads and directs the efforts of more junior staff during high-impact outages.

\u2022 Utilizes tools to verify and validate that proper thresholds and infrastructure/application information are represented and set appropriately

\u2022 Investigate incidents and and finds resolutions to insure future stability of infrastructure and data working with geographically dispersed teams

\u2022 Leverages experience and knowledge to proactively engage in root-cause analysis and preventative projects

\u2022 Provides technical expertise in cross-functional and intra-departmental efforts


Essential Requirements:

\u2022 Strong familiarity with Kafka, Mongo DB, Oracle DB support and scripting.

\u2022 Familiarity with monitoring and analyzing tools like New Relic and Splunk.

\u2022 Must be comfortable to quickly diagnose and identify root cause to resolve critical issues across multiple platforms.

\u2022 Strong communication, documentation and organizational skills.

\u2022 Must be driven to ensure the needed cooperation is obtained from associated/involved teams.

\u2022 BS degree in computer science or related engineering degree.

\u2022 3+ years working in Site Reliability, IT Ops, DevOps or similar functions.

\u2022 3+ years of hands-on experience with private/public cloud computing, including infrastructure, storage, and data management.

\u2022 3+ years of experience in general programming .Net Core and/or Java.
